title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection does not work on the first attempt. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection does not work on the first attempt. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: I expect that when I click on an item in the library outline view, it should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node on the first attempt.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item in the view. Observe that the selection doesn't work as expected, and the focus jumps to the library file node.
